RE: License #: CB410284045
Families Through Adoption
354 Norwood Ave. SE
Grand Rapids, MI 49506-1717
Dear Ms. Lanning:
Your Child Placing Agency license is renewed. It is valid only at your present address
and is nontransferable. If you move, please notify us at least 30 days in advance.
You will be receiving the license in the mail. Please review it for accuracy.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (269) 337-5289.
Sincerely,
Holly Austin, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
Suite 200
121 Franklin Street SE
Grand Rapids, MI 49507
(269) 330-7082
enclosure

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was offered technical assistance in the following areas:
Two references reviewed for a new hire were not dated. The administrator reported
that she completed all 3 references on the same date but dating each document
would verify the dates of completion.
V. CONSULTATION
Throughout the reporting period, consultation was provided regarding home visits
and report completion during the pandemic and Michigan stay at home orders.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
The agency has submitted one acceptable corrective action plans not related to
maltreatment during this licensing period.
The only CAP provided was related to one citation established during the 2019
interim licensing inspection regarding rule 44.12712(1) for post-placement reports
not being completed monthly prior to finalization. The agency staff has implemented
that CAP and all files reviewed during the 2020 inspection were found to be in
compliance.
During the inspection, the files of three domestic adoptions and three international
adoptions were reviewed. The files were found to be in compliance with all
requirements.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules.
December 17, 2020
________________________________________
Holly Austin Date
Licensing Consultant
